result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ladonaven R Brown

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Ladonaven R Brown in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.  Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   State moves to have this case dismissed and read-in to 15CM480, Court grants the State's motion. Conditions of bail remitted.
Jury trial - 12 person at 09-29-2015 08:30 am
Jury status hearing at 09-24-2015 09:30 am

Defendant LaDonaven R Brown in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense still needs to speak to ADA Osborne. Deferred prosecution agreement addressed. Defense advise the defendant has a new case in Milwaukee. Court will give another date in 3 weeks. Court will put 15CM356 back on the jury status/jury trial calendar. 15CM480 to trail along.  Jury status hearing scheduled for September 24, 2015 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for September 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Plea hearing on August 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Kelsey Morin in court.   Defendant Ladonaven R Brown did not appear.   Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense states there is a deferred prosecution agreement on this matter and requests another date. Court will adjourn the trial date and schedule this matter for 08/25/2015 at 8:30 a.m..  Plea hearing scheduled for August 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Filed by the State. Witness list attached.
Jury trial - 12 person on August 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Jury status hearing on August 20, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant LaDonaven R Brown in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense advises they need a jury status/jury trial on 15CM356.  15CM480 to trail along. Court grants request.  Jury status hearing scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for August 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Hearing on July 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant LaDonaven R Brown in court.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Attorney appears by authorization.  Parties still negotiationg.  Hearing scheduled for July 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Hearing on June 29, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Ladonaven R Brown in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.  Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears by authorization. Defense received documents from her client and needs to discuss this matter with ADA Osborne. Court will give another date in 2 weeks. Defense to let the court know on the next date how they will proceed on this matter.  Hearing scheduled for June 29, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Hearing on June 17, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Attorney appears by authorization

Attorney Jorge Fragoso for attorney Kelsey Morin.   Defendant Ladonaven R Brown did not appear.   Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears by authorization. Defense requested additional records and requests another date. Court will give a date in 3 weeks. Defense to let the Court know on the next date if this matter will be set for a plea or trial.  Hearing scheduled for June 17, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Hearing on May 27, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Ladonaven R Brown in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense is waiting for discovery on 15CM480. Defense is also waiting for video evidence. Defense requests a date in 60 days. Court grants request.  Hearing scheduled for May 27, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Hearing on March 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.  **no paper copy in physical file**
Defendant is not to have any violent contact with any victim/witness listed in the complaint.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.

Defendant Ladonaven R Brown in court, in custody, with attorney Katie B. Bricco.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for March 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
